translations: 凤梨；奶奶；看护婴儿的保姆；傻子（nana 的复数）

sentences.sentence: It was nanas very mole, down to the color of the hair.
sentences.translation: 那简直就是娜娜的痣，连颜色都一样。

sentences.sentence: My grandfather and two of my aunts were there as well, but all hung back in the hallway as I entered Nanas room.
sentences.translation: 祖父和两个姑姑也去了那里，但当我走进奶奶的房间里，他们都在走廊里止步了。
